entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Matapedia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:29 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT ENDED, Matapedia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:42 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 12.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h overnight. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow in the morning. Amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Cloudy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Clearing. High minus 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 22. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 19. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
